titleStmt.title: Cupid and death a private entertainment, represented with scenes & musick, vocall & instrumentall. Writen by J.S.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Crooke and John Playford, and are to be sold at their shops in St. Paul's Church yard and in the Inner Temple,

notesStmt.note: Variant: title page partly in a different setting (possibly a cancel), with "scenes, variety of dancing, and musick, both vocall & instrumentall" in the title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: their shops in St. Paul's Church yard
